name: Roselia
description: The Thorn Pokémon. Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this Pokémon brings serenity to living things.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.
